G

GameDriver - Class in risk.gamePlayer
this class controls the flow of the game based on the risk game rules, this class uses singleton design pattern it has following data memebers: graph players staticColorList colors of the players gameDriver a dataType of GameDriver class index contains the index of current player in round robin fashion
GameDriverTest - Class in test

GamePanel - Class in risk.gamePlayerUI
This is also is a panel for user play the game

getCurrentPlayer() - Method in class risk.gamePlayer.GameDriver

getGameDriverInstance() - Static method in class risk.gamePlayer.GameDriver
this method returns an instance of the GameDriver class, if the instance is null the object will be newed, otherwise it will return the already existing instance of the class.

this method returns an instance of the graph class,based on singleton design pattern
